title: PM meets US presidential special envoy on climate John Kerry
content:
DAVOS, Jan 16 (APP): Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Tuesday met the U.S. presidential special envoy on climate John Kerry on the sidelines of the World Economic Forum.
During the meeting they discussed the local and global impacts of climate change.
The two leaders also discussed the climate change related challenges being faced by the developing countries.
